desc: Majestic Blends is a PNW company of local artisans and roasters striving to create the most flavorful cup of fresh roasted coffee to fuel your adventures.

layout.text: Say hello to small batch organic coffees from Majestic Blends. Created in small batches, it’s roasted to perfection by passionate, experienced artisans who maximize every cup’s flavor using hand selected, 100% Arabica beans, sourced from sustainable farms the world over. Perfectly made to power your adventures.
